headline: Could This Be a Sign of Trouble for Netflix's Stock?
summary: Netflix's guidance for the year reflects a notable slowdown in its growth rate, even as its ad revenue is expected to double.

headline: Netflix Warner Bros. Discovery Deal Tests Growth Story And Valuation Assumptions
summary: Netflix has proposed an all cash $82.7b acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery, signaling a major shake up in global streaming and media. Regulators in the US and UK are preparing to review the deal for potential antitrust issues and implications for competition and consumer pricing. The offer would increase Netflix's debt load, adding financial risk alongside the potential benefits of a larger content library and broader distribution. For investors watching NasdaqGS:NFLX, this is a big...

headline: Is Artificial Intelligence Ready For Its Close-Up? Hollywood vs. The Tillyverse
summary: As employment levels in the movie business languish, the rise of AI in Hollywood poses a new threat to an already precarious job market.

headline: What’s next for Netflix with shares down 35% from its 52-week high?
summary: Investing.com -- Netflix shares have fallen more than 35 percent from their June 2025 peak, leaving investors questioning what comes next as the company faces a mix of margin uncertainty, engagement challenges and shifting deal dynamics tied to Warner Bros. Discovery.

headline: A Devon and Coterra Merger Could Become One of the Largest Shale Oil Deals Ever
summary: The US shale oil industry is one of the primary keys to US energy independence, a foundational block of the Trump administration’s policies for rebuilding US industry and reducing inflation and costs for US citizens. That’s why there are thousands who are eagerly awaiting word on the developments between merger talks between Devon Energy (NYSE: ... headline: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) Rallied Due to a Bidding War
summary: Hotchkis & Wiley, an investment management company, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter for the “Hotchkis & Wiley Large Cap Disciplined Value Fund.” A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In Q4 2025, the S&P 500 returned 2.7%, bringing its yearly gains to 17.9%. Since the 2007-08 financial crisis, the Index has increased tenfold, […]

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (WBD) Shares Poised for Upside as UBS Maintains Neutral Rating
summary: We recently published an article titled 8 Up and Coming Streaming Companies and Services. On January 28, UBS raised its price target on Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBD) to $30 from $20 while maintaining a Neutral rating on the shares, implying upside from the stock’s recent close of $28.63. The firm commenced trading on the […]

headline: Hollywood has an IP problem: Box office sales are banking on franchise hits that keep falling flat
summary: But big-name installments like "Wicked: For Good" and "Avatar: Fire and Ash" have been underperforming ticket sales expectations.
